meanings.definition: A periodic state of sexual excitement in male elephants.
meanings.sent1: During musths, male elephants become very excited.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper noticed the musths in the male elephant during mating season.
meanings.sent3: The musths of the elephant made him trumpet loudly in the jungle.
meanings.sent4: The musths of the male elephant were like a raging storm in the calm forest.
meanings.sent5: The musths of the elephant were so intense that even the other animals could sense it.

meanings.definition: The secretion produced during this state.
meanings.sent1: The musths of the male elephant had a strong scent.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the composition of the musths to understand elephant behavior.
meanings.sent3: The zoo visitors were surprised by the sweet smell of the musths.
meanings.sent4: The musths of the elephant flowed like a river of pheromones.
meanings.sent5: The musths of the male elephant were collected for scientific analysis.
